rules_text:
Flying
[i]Motivated Learner[/i] – Whenever another creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than Vanessa, Dutiful Rider, put a +1/+1 counter on her.
[i]Good Growths[/i] – If one or more counters would be put onto Vanessa, that many plus an additional counter of that kind are put on her instead.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if Vanessa, Dutiful Rider has toughness 5 or greater, transform her.
_
